name: Zobre Zombie
storyline:
The story focuses on a boy of no more than 15 years old, who, upon hearing sounds inside the house and his mother screaming, wakes up to go see what is happening; Upon entering the mother's room, she finds her crying, so we approach her to see what is happening, but when we are a few meters close to her, we discover that she has become another zombie, where she will chase us to eat us.

Not wanting to hurt our mother, the only thing we will do is run for our lives like that, leaving the house; Without having anywhere to go, you think about your father since he works at a military base so you will decide to go look for him.

We will have to go through different places to achieve it, and yet several monsters will be willing to prevent our objective from being met...
summary: It is an old-style platform game, where our opportunities are few and the enemies outnumber us.
